page.title: 05Pakenham P.C. (cont.from p4)
page.content: Queach Farm was recently arrested. The police are called to many quarrels and disputes between husbands and wives ,and between neighbours.There are far fewer road accidents on the smaller roads than on the main roads. The P.C. told us that Pakenham is difficult to patrol, being the largest parish in Suffolk.He said that the worst part of the job was infoming next of kin of the death of their love ones.The best part was catching a crook after a long search and being able to help people with their problems .He said that being able to help people who are locked out , lost or in some way distressed took about 1/4 of their time.They would be more available to local people when bikes are used again.At present there is insufficient manpower to allow for this.
